attributes.action: Establish A Sovereign Wealth Fund For The UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A soveriegn fund will provide the UK with the financial muscle to cushion itself from future financial crisis and provide the UK with the means to invest in the future of the public. Returns could be invested into public services and local businesses countering future spending cuts in vital sectors of our economy.
An example is Norways Government Fund: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Petroleum_Fund_of_Norway
